title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Skills: Augmented Reality-Based Multimedia Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain spatial relationships of scientific phenomena with over 80% accuracy through AR simulations.
Learners apply strategies to reduce cognitive load by 20% when integrating text-visual materials in augmented reality environments.
Learners improve problem-solving accuracy by 35% by utilizing auditory contextual information in AR science experiment simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
